Jeremy has been a great recruiting partner at Facebook.  As a candidate, I was impressed that Jeremy approached the recruitment process with a focus on building a strong relationship.  As a hiring manager at Facebook, I've witnessed Jeremy going the extra mile to understand candidates career motivations and he also provides constant communication through the interview process to keep candidates engaged and informed.  I've had the opportunity to work with Jeremy in a number of ways, but one of the most impactful has been design leadership dinners, which Jeremy leads the recruitment and logistics.  These dinners allow designers from different companies to come together and network with fellow design leaders.  Candidates also get an opportunity to speak to Facebook hiring managers.  Ultimately these dinners help Facebook to build strong relationships with the best talent in the world in a stimulating environment filled with great conversation and company.

September 29, 2015, Charlie was a client of Jeremy’s

I've worked with recruiters from most of the major consumer tech companies, either for myself or for my team. Jeremy is easily one of the best, and my experience with him was a big factor in deciding to move to Facebook.  He is a great positive example of how important the recruiting experience is to being competitive in the Bay Area.Jeremy stood out in three ways - speed, approach and follow-through. The importance of speed is not to be underestimated, particularly when candidates are often juggling offers with mismatched timeframes, or short timelines for decisions. He was always on point, at any time of the day.  Everything promised came through when expected (and in most cases, sooner).Secondly - he was super relaxed and thoughtful in all our interactions.  Sometimes with leadership roles, the recruiting style can be overly formal or procedural - and Jeremy was notable for how at ease he made me feel throughout the process.  I always felt like he represented me well and had my best interests at heart.Finally - Jeremy followed up right through to my first day, in what turned out to be a long period of discussion (due to my own side of things).  I never had to be the one to initiate or chase. He was proactive in all aspects of the hiring process, and that didn't stop when the contract was signed.From my experience and knowing the comparisons - for design leadership roles, I can't recommend him enough.
